verses.verse: <S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering is a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> if he offers <S%H7126><s%> it from the herd, <S%H1241><s%> whether male <S%H2145><s%> or female, <S%H5347><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it without blemish <S%H8549><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is from the flock; <S%H6629><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> or female, <S%H5347><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

<S%H7133><s%>"'If his offering is a goat, <S%H5795><s%> then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%>
